text: Reiichi Ikegami (born 12 July 1983) is a Japanese football player. Ikegami previously played for FC Tokyo in the J1 League. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Total Total 2006 FC Tokyo J1 League 0 0 1 0 0 0 1 0 2007 2 0 1 0 1 0 4 0 2008 0 0 0 0 1 0 1 0 2008 Thespa Kusatsu J2 League 0 0 0 0 - 0 0 2009 FC Kariya Football League 11 3 0 0 - 11 3 2010 FC Gifu J2 League 16 0 1 0 - 17 0 2011 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 Country Japan Japan 29 3 3 0 2 0 34 3 Total Total Total 29 3 3 0 2 0 34 3 ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Chiba Prefecture
